content.question: Cindy and Martin both sew t-shirts in a small factory. Using the same resources, Martin can sew twelve t-shirts and Cindy can sew nine t-shirts in one day. Which of the following can be concluded from the given information?

choices.label: Martin has a higher opportunity cost of sewing t-shirts than Cindy does.
Cindy has a comparative advantage in sewing t-shirts.
Martin has a comparative advantage in sewing t-shirts.
Martin has an absolute advantage in sewing t-shirts.
Cindy has an absolute advantage in sewing t-shirts.

content.answer: Martin has an absolute advantage in sewing t-shirts.
